AskConversationPanel
 
BeingAddedInChatroomAction
Action called when the current user is being added in a chatroom Add the conversation to the list of conversations of the current user

Initial view state Display the fields necessary to connect
LoadAllChatroomSummariesAction
Action used to load summaries of the conversations of the current user Summaries of conversations contain for each conversation its id, number of messages in the conversation and hash of the last message in the conversation.

ReceivedMessagePanel
 
ReceiveMessageAction
Receive a message sent to the current user and add it to the right conversation
RequestAddUserToChatroomAction
In charge of adding a user to a conversation when the user request it.
RequestConnectionAction
In charge of connecting a user and making connected into the UserDAO.
RequestCreateChatroomAction
In charge of creating a chatroom.
RequestGetAllMessagesFromChatroomAction
In charge of sending all messages from a conversation to a user.
RequestGetAllMessagesFromChatroomSinceHashAction
In charge of sending all messages from a conversation since a has to a user.
RequestGetChatroomSummariesAction
In charge of sending the summaries of conversations to a user.
RequestQuitConversationAction
In charge of deleting a user from a conversation.

SendMessageAction
In charge of sending message to all user in the conversation.
